medium: Cotton, wool, synthetic; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, appliqué
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Three-panel huipil; square neckline with applied fabric appliquéd with rickrack; vertical stripes, white alternating with wide red stripes that have fine stripes of green and orange; side panels have simple rows of rectangular weft patterning predominantly red with acqua, purple and pink accents; central panel is decorated with denser brocaded patterns of geometric shapes and lozenges.
